column5: Description of measure (where possible measures are described in terms of the classes of information defined in NHS Data Dictionary)
column6: UIDs of derivations used (defined in Technical Output Specification)

column5: Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period
column8: Count of distinct (IDS101Referral.PathwayID) where IDS101Referral.ReferralRequestReceivedDate is in the period and IDS101Referral.UsePathway_Flag = 'True'

column5: Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'self'
column8: Count of distinct (IDS101Referral.PathwayID) where IDS101Referral.ReferralRequestReceivedDate is in the period and IDS101Referral.SourceOfReferralIAPT = 'B1' and IDS101Referral.UsePathway_Flag = 'True'

column5: Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'General Medical Practitioner Practice'
column8: Count of distinct (IDS101Referral.PathwayID) where IDS101Referral.ReferralRequestReceivedDate is in the period and IDS101Referral.SourceOfReferralIAPT = 'A1' and IDS101Referral.UsePathway_Flag = 'True'

column5: Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Health Visitor'
column8: Count of distinct (IDS101Referral.PathwayID) where IDS101Referral.ReferralRequestReceivedDate is in the period and IDS101Referral.SourceOfReferralIAPT = 'A2' and IDS101Referral.UsePathway_Flag = 'True'

column5: Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with other sources of referral
column8: Count distinct (IDS101Referral.PathwayID) with ReferralRequestReceivedDate in period, SourceOfReferralIAPT not in ('A1','A2','B1') and UsePathway_Flag = 'True'
